unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, always swore by Ayurveda. Back in Kerala, during Onam celebrations, she'd make a special herbal concoction. Initially, I was skeptical. However, after suffering from chronic fatigue, even after seeing doctors in Delhi and spending almost Rs. 5000 on tests, I decided to try a Panchakarma retreat near Rishikesh. The 7-day detox really made a difference! Still early days, but I already feel 100 km lighter! Will keep everyone posted on my progress.
